text.title: part7_The Raveonettes on love, death, desire and war

hi.s:
DS : You 're forced to choose between having either
India
or
China
blown off the face of the Earth , and if you do n't choose , they both go .
They are equal in population according to the 2000 census in each country , with each having roughly 1.2 billion people .
Which do you choose , and why ?

text.p:
Sharin :
[
Laughs
]

Sune :
You would choose India because your grandparents are from China !

Sharin :
No ! I would choose China !

Sune :
Really ? !
You would blow up your grandparents ?

Sharin :
Yup ! [
Laughs
]

Sune :
[ '
Laughs
]
God !
That 's so rude !

hi.s: Sharin :

p.s: No , to me , India is a democracy , it 's the world 's largest democracy and I 've been there .
I found it be a really spiritual place .
Some of the most intelligent people I have ever met are from India .
And China , I have to say , not so much .
I have only been to the countryside .
My grandfather is Chinese as well ; I 'm a quarter Chinese .
I just think they are more barbaric by their culture ... .

text.p:
Sune :
[
Shaking his head
] We 're never going to tour China now ... .

Sharin :
[
Giggles
]

hi.s: DS : You would go with China too , then ?

text.p:
Sune :
I 'm not going to choose ... you can blow them both up !

hi.s: DS : Really ?
They 'll all go ?

text.p:
Sune :
Well , I mean , I do n't know , come on ... I 'll go with Sharin , then .
We 'll keep India .

hi.s:
DS : Sharin , you have a choice between either dating a man who is losing it hair and he tries to style the remaining hair artistically to cover it up , or you have a choice of dating a man with
man boobs
--

text.p:
Sharin :
What boobs ?

hi.s: DS : Breasts

text.p:
Sune :
Oohhh

hi.s: DS : Who would you go for more ?

text.p:
Sharin :
[
Laughs
]
What kind of question is that ?

Sune :
It 's a psychological test ?

hi.s: DS : Is n't every question ?
Sharin :
DS : You 'd go for the hair ?

text.p:
Sharin :
Yeah !

Sune :
I 'd go for the boobs .

Sharin :
I 'd go for the hair .

hi.s: DS : You 'd go for the man boobs ?

text.p:
Sune :
Absolutely ! I actually knew a guy , he lost a bet and he had to have breasts for a year .
He was a magician .

Sharin :
[
Laughs
]

hi.s: DS : Like a masectomy bra ?

text.p:
Sune :
No , he got
silicon
...

hi.s: DS : Oh !
He went through an operation ?

text.p:
Sune :
Yeah !
And actually his breasts were pretty nice .
We used to ...

Sharin :
[
Laughs
]

hi.s: DS : When I was in college I had a couple of friends who were rave kids -- they also went to my college -- and the guy walked around with very large breasts , and our friend Koo would follow him on the street and after he passed people who noticed his large breasts she would go up and say , " Would you let that man babysit your children ?
" to see the reactions from people .
" Do you trust him ?
" It was surprising , because the people who looked the most uptight generally responded with things like , " Yeah , sure , he does n't seem so bad .

But the people who looked the most
hippie
and free -- this was in Boulder -- would say things , " I do n't know ! What 's wrong with him , why does he have breasts ?
